sentences.en: ...stories of noble princes and their brave deeds on behalf of beautiful maidens.
sentences.cn: …高贵的王子以及他们英雄救美的故事。

sentences.en: After her divorce she reverted to ( using ) her maiden name.
sentences.cn: 她离婚后又重新使用娘家的姓.

sentences.en: In 1912, the Titanic sank on her maiden voyage.
sentences.cn: 1912年，“泰坦尼克”号在处女航中失事沉没。

sentences.en: It was the ship's maiden voyage.
It was virtually the maiden expedition of these two ambitious young forest soldiers.
sentences.cn: 这次行动才是这两位雄心勃勃的森林战士的初次出征.

sentences.en: Looking up at the eaves, Orchid muttered: " Why isn't Spring Maiden back yet? "
sentences.cn: 兰花向天井檐上张一张, 自言自语地说: “ 青姑娘还不回来 呢 !

sentences.en: Maiden, your simplicity, like the blueness of the lake, reveals your depth of truth.
sentences.cn: 少女呀, 你的纯朴, 如湖水之碧,表现出你的真理之深邃.

sentences.en: Motherhood dawned, the old simplicity of her maiden days came back to her.
sentences.cn: 母性出现了, 她做闺女日子里的那种天真心情又复活了.

sentences.en: She will be an old maiden if she remains single.
sentences.cn: 她要是再不结婚可真成了老姑娘了.

sentences.en: The aircraft makes its maiden flight tomorrow.

sentences.cn: 那女孩跳跳蹦蹦地走了.

sentences.en: The prince fell in love with a fair young maiden.
sentences.cn: 王子爱上了一位年轻美丽的少女.

sentences.en: The veil of the maiden is white; the wreath of roses which she wears is white.
sentences.cn: 小姑娘的面纱是白的, 她戴的蔷薇花环也是白色的.

sentences.en: This book is his maiden effort.
This is the ship's maiden voyage.

words.tran_cn: 文雅的；谨慎的；像处女的

phrases.tran_cn: 铁娘子；铁处女（英国伦敦的重金属乐队）

trans.tran_cn: 处女的，少女的，首次的，初次的，没有经验的
trans.tran_en: The maiden voyage or flight of a ship or aircraft is the first official journey that it makes

trans.tran_cn: 未婚女子，处女，断头机，未得分的投球
trans.tran_en: a young girl, or a woman who is not married
